bundle.longDescription:
Handwriting keyboard for Linux X11 desktop environment. 

 Currently supports Chinese language only. 

 To recognize handwritten pattern program uses Google API. 

 Github page: 

 https://github.com/BigIskander/Handwriting-keyboard-for-Linux./tree/main

args.name: server-url
args.description:
Handwriting recognition server's URL, 
 default value is Google's API server 
 https://www.google.com/inputtools/request?ime=handwriting&app=mobilesearch&cs=1&oe=UTF-8

args.name: language
args.description: BCP 47 language tag, default value is zh-CN

args.name: use-ydotool
args.description: Use ydotool to send keyboard input. By default xdotool is used.

args.name: use-shift
args.description:
Trigger shift+ctrl+V keypress to paste text from clipboard. 
By default program uses ctrl+V.

args.name: fly-to-bottom
args.description:
At launch program window will fly to the bottom of the screen 
 and resize to screen width.

args.name: return-keyboard
args.description:
After sending keyboard input program will trigger alt+Tab keypress 
to return focus back to keyboad's window.
